message: Let's split the money 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer that allows both of us to benefit from this game.
I think a 55/45 split is a bit more balanced, but I'm open to further discussion.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer was already fair.  I'm willing to meet you halfway to show my commitment to a swift resolution. Let's split it 55/45.
